Plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting everything ablaze, establishing dominance over the planet.
Title: Reign of Fire
Writer: Gregg Chabot (story), Kevin Peterka (story), Gregg Chabot (screenplay), Kevin Peterka (screenplay), Matt Greenberg (screenplay)
Actors: Christian Bale, Matthew McConaughey, Izabella Scorupco, Gerard Butler
tomatoConsensus: An enjoyable B-movie if you don't use your brain.
